about_the_game:
Guide to a slow life


In "Grandfather Simulator" you will experience all the delights of a grandfather's measured life. Planning your day begins with an important decision - watch the news or watch your favorite series on TV.

Interaction with the outside world


You can feel the atmosphere of grandpa's real day, playing with his devoted dog, arguing with his wife about a misplaced slipper or forgotten pills. Be prepared for unpredictable turns!

Self-care


Don't forget about your health! From time to time you will have to take pills to maintain your well-being, and, of course, eat delicious food.

Recreation and entertainment


Whether you sleep in the evening or doze off in front of the TV is up to you. In "Grandfather Simulator" you can also go for a walk, breathing in fresh virtual air and meeting neighbors.

Are you ready to become a real grandfather and lead a measured life full of laughter and surprises? Immerse yourself in Grandfather Simulator and test your skills in managing a caring grandfather right now!

short_description: Open the door to Grandfather's life! Watch TV series, play with the dog, argue with your wife, take pills, eat lunch, sleep, go for a walk. Live the measured life of a grandfather, where every day is an adventure, and routine is an art!
